attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/agile-bows.png} tip={Agile Bows (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/illusion-step.png} tip={Illusion Step (4th Job)} val={+80}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/marksmanship.png} tip={Marksmanship (3rd Job)} val={+25%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-barrage.png} tip={Quiver Barrage (5th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/soul-arrow.png} tip={Soul Arrow: Bow (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/reckless-hunt.png} tip={Reckless Hunt: Bow (3rd Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/bow-expert.png} tip={Bow Expert (4th Job)} val={+60}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/advanced-final-attack.png} tip={Advanced Final Attack (4th Job)} val={+20}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/concentration.png} tip={Concentration (Hyper Skill)} val={+50}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/adventurers-curiosity.png} tip={Adventurer's Curiosity (Link Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/critical-shot.png} tip={Critical Shot (1st Job)} val={+40%}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/bow-expert.png} tip={Bow Expert (4th Job)} val={+16%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/vicious-shot.png} tip={Vicious Shot (5th Job)} val={+50% of Crit Rate}>

attackStats.detail: <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/storm-of-arrows.png} tip={Storm of Arrows (5th Job)} val={+30%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/mortal-blow.png} tip={Mortal Blow (3rd Job)} val={+35% after 30 successful attacks}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/reckless-hunt.png} tip={Reckless Hunt: Bow (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/enchanted-quiver.png} tip={Enchanted Quiver (4th Job)} val={+6%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/armor-break.png} tip={Armor Break (4th Job)} val={+7%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-barrage.png} tip={Quiver Barrage (5th Job)} val={+15%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/marksman/marksmanship.png} tip={Marksmanship (3rd Job)} val={+25%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/armor-break.png} tip={Armor Break (4th Job)} val={+40%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/sharp-eyes-guardbreak.png} tip={Sharp Eyes - Guardbreak (Hyper Skill)} val={+5%}>

buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/concentration.png} tip={Concentration (Hyper Skill)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/storm-of-arrows.png} tip={Storm of Arrows (5th Job)} dur={[70s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/inhuman-speed.png} tip={Inhuman Speed (5th Job)} dur={[3-30s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-barrage.png} tip={Quiver Barrage (5th Job)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/vicious-shot.png} tip={Vicious Shot (5th Job)} dur={[30s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/silhouette-mirage.png} tip={Silhouette Mirage (5th Job)} dur={(-90% | 50s recharge (max 2), 7.5s cd on block)}>[<em text={Only blocks attacks that deal more than 50% Max HP}>]

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Archer to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Bowman' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Bowman and talk to Athena Pierce to accept a quest called 'The 2 Trails of the Bowman'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Hunter and you will be on the path to a Bowmaster. Hunter is the 2nd job of Bowmaster

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/double-jump-1.png} tip={Double Jump}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/archery-mastery.png} tip={Archery Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/critical-shot.png} tip={Critical Shot}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/arrow-blow.png} tip={Arrow Blow}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/bow-mastery.png} tip={Bow Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/agile-bows.png} tip={Agile Bows}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/soul-arrow.png} tip={Soul Arrow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/wind-arrow.png} tip={Wind Arrow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/covering-fire.png} tip={Covering Fire}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/reckless-hunt.png} tip={Reckless Hunt: Bow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/phoenix.png} tip={Phoenix}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/evasion-boost.png} tip={Evasion Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/marksmanship.png} tip={Marksmanship}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/blink-shot.png} tip={Blink Shot}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/speed-mirage.png} tip={Speed Mirage}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/mortal-blow.png} tip={Mortal Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/focused-fury.png} tip={Focused Fury}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/armor-break.png} tip={Armor Break}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/bow-expert.png} tip={Bow Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/advanced-final-attack.png} tip={Advanced Final Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream.png} tip={Arrow Stream}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/sharp-eyes.png} tip={Sharp Eyes}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/illusion-step.png} tip={Illusion Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/enchanted-quiver.png} tip={Enchanted Quiver}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane.png} tip={Hurricane}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/speed-mirage-ii.png} tip={Speed Mirage II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/sharp-eyes-guardbreak.png} tip={Sharp Eyes - Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/sharp-eyes-critical-chance.png} tip={Sharp Eyes - Critical Chance}> Sharp Eyes - Guardbreak and Critical Chance_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane-reinforce.png} tip={Hurricane - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane-boss-rush.png} tip={Hurricane - Boss Rush}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane-split-attack.png} tip={Hurricane - Split Attack}> Hurricane - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Split Attack_>[For Training]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream-reinforce.png} tip={Arrow Stream - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream-extra-strike.png} tip={Arrow Stream - Extra Strike}> Arrow Stream - Reinforce and Extra Strike can be used when training with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream.png} tip={Arrow Stream (4th Job)}> instead of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/sharp-eyes-guardbreak.png} tip={Sharp Eyes - Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/sharp-eyes-critical-chance.png} tip={Sharp Eyes - Critical Chance}>_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane.png} tip={Hurricane (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster/Speed Mirage (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack: Bow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream.png} tip={Arrow Stream (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-cartridge.png} tip={Quiver Cartridge (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/gritty-gust.png} tip={Gritty Gust (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/phoenix.png} tip={Phoenix (3rd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good

5 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_Each skill above should appear in 2 nodes_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/archer/arrow-blow.png} tip={Arrow Blow (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack: Bow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/wind-arrow.png} tip={Wind Arrow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-cartridge.png} tip={Quiver Cartridge (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/covering-fire.png} tip={Covering Fire (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/phoenix.png} tip={Phoenix (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster/Speed Mirage (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane.png} tip={Hurricane (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream.png} tip={Arrow Stream (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/gritty-gust.png} tip={Gritty Gust (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Mouse and the members of the Bowmaster Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Arrow Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Arrows Fired: 3

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

While in the air, double-tapping the Up/Down Arrow Key will perform an Up Jump or Down Jump<bp_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF to perform the jump by pressing Up/Down Arrow Key + Jump Key instead_>

primary.name: Critical Shot
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Archery Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Range +120, Movement Speed +30, Attack Speed: +1.\nMax Movement Speed Increased to 160

primary.name: Wind Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 178%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fire a flurry of arrows that damage multiple enemies

primary.name: Covering Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, if you press and hold the skill key after jumping a certain distance backward, you will attack enemies at up to 105% of damage for 2 sec while in mid-air
primary.desc: Leap backwards into the air and fire a stream of arrows
details: While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Quiver Cartridge
primary.shortDesc: 30% chance to fire a magic arrow that pursues the enemy and deals 220% damage.
primary.desc: While active, your attacks have a chance to create a homing arrow
details: In 4th Job, you gain an additional arrow type, pressing the Skill Key will allow you to swap between two types of arrow types

primary.name: Agile Bows
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20

primary.name: Soul Arrow: Bow
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30. Allows you to attack without consuming arrows.
details: Uses the arrow with the highest Attack to calculate your damage

primary.name: Bow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Final Attack : Bow
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% Final Attack damage.
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Arrow Blaster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 181%. While casting, use the Interact/Harvest key to set up Arrow Blaster, firing arrows that deal 85% damage for 30 sec.\nCooldown for installed Arrow Blaster: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Fires a stream of arrows at a chosen angle
details: While casting, pressing the Up and Down Arrow Keys changes the angle of firing

While casting, pressing the 'Interact / Harvest' key will set up an Arrow Blaster at your location<bp_You can change the key to the Attack Key instead by right-clicking the skill_Unaffected by Damage Reflect_>

primary.name: Speed Mirage
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 9. After successfully striking enemies 12 times with arrow-based attacks, creates 3 afterimages that fire an arrow towards an enemy ahead of them.
Every 7 hits with Arrow Blaster, Hurricane, Silhouette Mirage, Inhuman Speed, Quiver Barrage, and Storm of Arrows count as 1 successful strike.
Fired arrows pierce up to 5 enemies and deal 420% damage 4 times on the way to its intended target.
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect] Increases Wind Arrow's Range and Damage by 70%p.
primary.desc: After successfully landing 12 arrow-based attacks, afterimages are created that fire piercing arrows towards an enemy
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the range and %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/wind-arrow.png} tip={Wind Arrow (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount

Every 7 hits from the following attacks count as 1 successful arrow-based attack, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane.png} tip={Hurricane (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/silhouette-mirage.png} tip={Silhouette Mirage (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/inhuman-speed.png} tip={Inhuman Speed (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-barrage.png} tip={Quiver Barrage (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/storm-of-arrows.png} tip={Storm of Arrows (5th Job)}><bp_Stationary attacks from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster (3rd Job)}> don't count towards the successful strikes_>

primary.name: Phoenix
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, summon Phoenix for 220 sec.\nAttack up to 4 enemies at once with 390% damage. 95% chance to Stun\n[Passive Effects: Increase Defense by 30%]
primary.desc: Summons a Phoenix that fights alongside you
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Blink Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28. Places a marker that lasts 120 sec.\nUse skill again to teleport to the marker's location. Teleport Cooldown: 2 sec.\nUse the skill again while holding the Down Arrow key to replace your previous marker. Marker Placement Cooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: Places a marker down that allows you to teleport back to it freely while active
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again allows you to teleport to the marker
While active, pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together allows you to move the marker to your position

primary.name: Reckless Hunt: Bow
primary.shortDesc: DEF: -25%, Attack Power: +40, Final Damage: +30%

primary.name: Mortal Blow
primary.shortDesc: If the direct skill attacks hit 30 times, damage increases by 35% for 5 sec.
primary.desc: After landing a number of successful attacks, gain a buff that increases %Damage briefly

primary.name: Focused Fury
primary.shortDesc: While attacking, Status Resistance will increase by 5 per hit up to 100 for 90 sec. Resets when an Abnormal Status is received.\n[Passive Effects: Increases Status Resistance by 20 and Elemental Resistance by 20%]
primary.desc: While attacking, you periodically gain Abnormal Status Resistance
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Resets when an Abnormal Status is received

primary.name: Evasion Boost
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 30%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be criticals, Knockback Resistance: +40%, Max HP: +40%
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Dodging an attack, causes all your attacks to be Critical Hits briefly
Also permanently increases %Knockback Resistance and %Max HP

primary.name: Marksmanship
primary.shortDesc: When attacking, ignores 25% of monster's Weapon DEF. Attack Power: +25%

primary.name: Hurricane
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Damage per Arrow: 350%\n[Passive Effect: Increases damage for Arrow Stream by 50%p]
primary.desc: While held, fires a continuous flurry of arrows at a single enemy
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream.png} tip={Arrow Stream (4th Job)}> by a flat amount
You can move and jump while firing
Prioritizes the target with the highest HP first

primary.name: Arrow Stream
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, attack up to 8 enemies with 350% damage 5 times.
primary.desc: Fires a barrage of arrows forward

primary.name: Speed Mirage II
primary.shortDesc: Reduces the number of successful arrow strikes required to activate Speed Mirage to 7.\nIncreases number of afterimages created to 4.\nAfterimage Arrow Damage: +120%p.
details: Reduces the number of successful arrow-based attacks required to activate attack to 7
Increases the %p Damage and number of afterimages created of the attack

primary.name: Enchanted Quiver
primary.shortDesc: Magic Arrows: Increases Magic Arrows' activation chance to 60% and its Damage to 260%.\nBlood Arrows: Your arrows have a 60% chance to restore 1.8% of Max HP.\n[Passive Effect: Final Damage: +6%]
details: Increases the %Damage and activation chance of the homing arrows

Adds a new arrow type, Blood Arrows, that have a chance to recover %Max HP<bp_Swap between arrow types by pressing <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-cartridge.png} tip={Quiver Cartridge (2nd Job)}>_>
Also permanently increases your %Final Damage

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: 20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Bow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +60, Critical Damage: +16%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage
Allows you to deploy <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster (3rd Job)}> at the highest and lowest angle by holding the Down / Up Arrow Key while deploying

primary.name: Illusion Step
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +80, Bonus Avoidability Chance: 30%, Damage Taken: -20%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 70%, Damage: 210%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Armor Break
primary.shortDesc: Ignore Defense: +40%, Final Damage: +7%

hyperPassive.name: Hurricane - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster (3rd Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane.png} tip={Hurricane (4th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Hurricane - Split Attack
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Number of Attacks: +1, reduces Damage to 75% of the original Damage

hyperActive.name: Concentration
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 40 sec, Attack Power: +50, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 120 sec.

hyperActive.name: Gritty Gust
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 335%, Number of Attacks: 12
Reduces Speed of hit enemies by -30 for 20 sec.
Cooldown: 15 sec
[Passive Effects: Increases damage of Arrow Blaster and Arrow Blaster turrets by 90%p]
hyperActive.desc: Release a gust of wind that damages and applies a slowing debuff
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Storm of Arrows
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Damage: +30%, Duration: 70 sec, arrows rain down every 5 sec for 2.5 sec when you attack with your own skills. Up to 6 of these zones can be created, but they cannot overlap.
The falling arrows deal 1540% damage on up to 10 enemies 7 times. If currently attacking more than one enemy, the number of attacks increases by 2 for each additional enemy, for up to 8 additional attacks.
Magic Arrow activation chance applied to attacks in this area is 2x that of Quiver Cartridge.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Damage and arrows periodically rain from the sky on to enemies
details: If attacking more than one enemy, the arrows gain increased number of attacks for each additional enemy
Magic Arrows from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-cartridge.png} tip={Quiver Cartridge (2nd Job)}> have an increased chance to activate where arrows rain down
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Inhuman Speed
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800, Max Duration: 30 sec. Fires arrows at set intervals dealing 880% 3 times to enemies within range of your afterimages, for 3 sec., during the buff.
When the attack hits, Afterimage Attack Duration: +3 sec every 1 sec.
When the attack duration ends, afterimages stop attacking.
Cooldown: 120 sec
[Passive Effect: Every 10 attacks performed while this skill is on cooldown, an afterimage is created that lasts 1 sec and periodically attacks enemies within its range for 880% damage 3 times.]
Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.
fifthMain.desc: While active, afterimages fire arrows at nearby enemies
details: While active, if you land successful attacks for 1 sec, the duration of the attack increases by 3 sec (up to 30 sec)
While the skill is not active, every few attacks will activate a brief afterimage to fire arrows

fifthMain.name: Quiver Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 40 sec, Attack Power: +20%. Fire every type of arrowhead at once, including a flaming arrowhead.\nFlaming Arrow: Launches 6 flaming arrows consecutively. Duration: 5 sec., Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 9, fires 6 flaming arrows up to 18 times. The attack won't activate if the buff remains when all the prepared flaming arrows are consumed. Cooldown: 2 sec.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Attack and uses every <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-cartridge.png} tip={Quiver Cartridge (2nd Job)}> arrow type at once
details: While active, temporarily adds a new arrow type, Flaming Arrows that explodes damaging nearby enemies
There is a limited amount of Flaming Arrows that can be fired
Flaming Arrows prioritize bosses with the highest HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Silhouette Mirage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Creates up to 2 illusory doubles every 50 sec.
When you either receive damage that is at least 50% of your Max HP or you receive damage that leads to death, 1 illusory double disappears and that damage reduces by 90%
If you have even 1 illusory double, and there is an enemy to attack nearby, when using an attack skill, 5 illusory bullets will deal 880% damage 3 times. MP Cost: 80, Cooldown: 7.5 sec
Cooldown: 1.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: When toggled, upon taking damage greater than or equal to 50% of your Max HP, a mirage (if available) will be consumed and the damage taken will be reduced
details: If you have a mirage active, successful attacks periodically trigger an additional attack
Gain 1 mirage every 50 secs (up to 2 max)
Right-clicking the skill will turn the mirage visual effect on/off
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.name: Final Attack: Bow Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Final Attack: Bow and Advanced Final Attack Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/hurricane.png} tip={Hurricane (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Hurricane
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 12, Damage: 575% per shot
Obtain 1 special arrowhead when attack hits, Max Special Arrowheads Obtained: 75
When you obtain 40 special arrowheads, you can switch to Shootout Mode
Shootout Mode - MP Cost: 12, consumes 1 special arrowhead when attack hits to fire even more arrows at once, Damage: 750% per shot
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-stream.png} tip={Arrow Stream (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster/Speed Mirage (3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Arrow Stream
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 37, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 610%, Number of Attacks: 5
Enhanced Arrow Stream: MP Cost: 42, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 5
Cooldown: 6 sec
[Passive Effect: Advanced Final Attack Damage: +320%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Arrow Blaster
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 530%.\nWhile casting, use the Interact/Harvest key to set up Arrow Blaster, firing arrows that deal 440% damage for 60 sec.\nCooldown for Installed Arrow Blaster: 5 sec.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/quiver-cartridge.png} tip={Quiver Cartridge (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/phoenix.png} tip={Phoenix (3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Quiver Cartridge
masteryCore.shortDesc: Magic Arrows: 60% chance to shoot Magic Arrows that deal 442% Damage.\nBlood Arrows: Your arrows have a 60% chance to restore 1.8% of Max HP.
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Phoenix
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 85, summon Phoenix for 270 sec.\nAttack up to 6 enemies with 975% damage. 95% chance to Stun
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Extra Quiver Cartridge
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 120, uses additional special arrowheads over 30 sec, and automatically ends when all arrowheads are used
Special arrowhead - Damage: 1300%, Max Loads Per Quiver Cartridge: 50
In Auto Mode, Extra Quiver Cartridges are auto triggered when the total loaded arrows in each cartridge exceeds 50
Cooldown: 30 sec
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF Auto Mode

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/arrow-blaster.png} tip={Arrow Blaster/Speed Mirage (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bowmaster/gritty-gust.png} tip={Gritty Gust (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Speed Mirage
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 105. After successfully striking enemies 7 times with arrow-based attacks, creates 4 afterimages that fire an arrow towards an enemy ahead of them.
Every 7 hits with Arrow blaster, Hurricane, Silhouette Mirage, Inhuman Speed, Quiver Barrage, and Storm of Arrows count as 1 successful arrow-based strike.
Fired arrows pierce up to 5 enemies and deal 1245% damage 4 times on the way to its intended target.
Cooldown: 1 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Gritty Gust
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 230, Damage: 570%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 12\nSpeed decreases by -30 over 20 sec\nCooldown: 15 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Ascendant Shadow
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1425%, Number of Attacks: 14, Arrow Flurries: 39
When the attack hits after the last arrow flurry, Duration: every 3 sec for 30 sec, Max enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1543%, Number of Attacks: 8, Arrow Flurries: 7
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Silhouette Mirage Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Silhouette Mirage Final Damage: +60%, increases damage reduction by 95% when illusory double disappears, triggers illusory arrows even if no double is created

meta: Bowmaster is a DEX archer class part of the Explorers. Bowmaster utilize Bows as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Bowmaster can equip Arrow Fletchings
